channel.description: Recent content in opencre on OWASP SAMM

item.title: SAMM Mappings
item.description: Direct Mappings Mapping between NIST SSDF and SAMM In collaboration with NIST, we created mappings based on the National Online Informative Reference (OLIR) Program . An Informative Reference shows the relationships between the Reference Document elements (NIST SSDF Tasks) and a Focal Document element (OWASP SAMM Streams). This effectively helps users understand the characterization of the nature of each relationship. You can find the mapping in this spreadsheet .
